Translations.Text: Recall ona (Muhammad) je tvoj ludia when ona set out assign believers ich positions for battle GOD bol Hearer Omniscient
zoskupit ona skoro zlyhat GOD bol ich Lord Do GOD believers trust
GOD granted ONA victory Badr TVOJ weakness. Therefore ona observe GOD show tvoj appreciation
Ona told believers Je it nie enough ze tvoj Lord supports ona 3000 angels sent nadol
Indeed ona steadfastly persevere maintain righteousness potom they zachvatit ona zrazu tvoj Lord support ona 5000 angels lepsi vlak
GOD thus INFORMOVAT ONA v poradie DAT ONA DOBRY zvest assure TVOJ srdce Victory pojdem len z GOD Almighty Wise
He thus annihilates some disbelievers neutralizes them; they vzdy koniec losers
Je up do ona; He redeem them He punish them for ich transgressions
Do GOD belongs everything heavens zem! He forgives whomever He wills punishes whomever He wills! GOD bol Forgiver Merciful
